# References {.unnumbered}

::: {#refs}
:::

## Recommended Reading

### Foundational Texts

- **Rosner, B.** (2015). *Fundamentals of Biostatistics* (8th ed.). Cengage Learning.
- **Pagano, M., & Gauvreau, K.** (2000). *Principles of Biostatistics* (2nd ed.). Duxbury Press.
- **Jewell, N. P.** (2003). *Statistics for Epidemiology*. Chapman and Hall/CRC.

### Advanced Methods

- **Kleinbaum, D. G., & Klein, M.** (2012). *Survival Analysis: A Self-Learning Text* (3rd ed.). Springer.
- **Hosmer, D. W., Lemeshow, S., & Sturdivant, R. X.** (2013). *Applied Logistic Regression* (3rd ed.). Wiley.
- **Diggle, P., Heagerty, P., Liang, K. Y., & Zeger, S.** (2002). *Analysis of Longitudinal Data* (2nd ed.). Oxford University Press.

### Statistical Software

- **R Core Team** (2023). *R: A language and environment for statistical computing*. R Foundation for Statistical Computing. https://www.R-project.org/
- **Wickham, H., & Grolemund, G.** (2017). *R for Data Science*. O'Reilly Media. https://r4ds.had.co.nz/
- **VanderPlas, J.** (2016). *Python Data Science Handbook*. O'Reilly Media.

### Methodological Resources

- **Altman, D. G.** (1991). *Practical Statistics for Medical Research*. Chapman and Hall/CRC.
- **Bland, M.** (2015). *An Introduction to Medical Statistics* (4th ed.). Oxford University Press.
- **Zar, J. H.** (2013). *Biostatistical Analysis* (5th ed.). Pearson.

### Online Resources

- **Khan Academy Statistics and Probability**: https://www.khanacademy.org/math/statistics-probability
- **Coursera Biostatistics Courses**: Various universities offer comprehensive biostatistics courses
- **edX Statistics Courses**: Free courses from top universities
- **R Documentation**: https://www.rdocumentation.org/
- **Python Statistics Libraries**: SciPy, StatsModels, Scikit-learn documentation
